title: Hello, Looking for someone with decent game knowledge.
body:
i have spent a bit of time recently trying to pay more attention to how im doing things, map awareness, playing aggressive/safe, to roam or not to roam, handling certain matchups differently.
I know its a long shot but if theres anyone out there who has some knowledge to share or could take a look at one of my matches and give me feedback on the things i am doing right and the things im doing wrong before i start this seasons climb.

thanks in advance to anyone that takes time to reply.

Add me ingame, Dirtbagjoe 
OCE

replies.body: Hi. I'm not ranked yet, but I would be happy to help you. I am a support/jungle main. I'm not ranked, but I think I know enough to give an outsiders (is that the right word there) perspective on your games.
